name: EDD Discount Emails
author: Ren Ventura

sections.description: Once activated, the plugin adds a new setting to the Easy Digital Downloads (EDD) add/edit discount page. You can enter a single email, or a list of emails with each email separated by a comma. When a discount has an email requirement, it will be applied to the cart only when the customer’s email address is in the required emails for that specific discount.
sections.installation:
Automatically

  1. Search for EDD Discount Emails in the Add New Plugin section of the WordPress admin.
  2. Install and activate.

Manually

  1. Download the zip file, decompress the file and upload the main plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
sections.changelog:
version 1.1

  • Tweaked email verification on validating discount count

1.0

  • Initial version

short_description: Set a list of emails to limit the usability of a discount code in Easy Digital Downloads.
description: Once activated, the plugin adds a new setting to the Easy Digital Downloads (EDD) add/edit discount page. You can enter a single email, or a list of emails with each email separated by a comma. When a discount has an email requirement, it will be applied to the cart only when the customer’s email address is in the required emails for that specific discount.

screenshots.caption: The add/edit discount page with the new Email Requirement setting.
